name: Hollow
description: “I didn't care about this ship… facility… whatever… Had to… Something, deep in my brain, deep in my flesh, boiled inside to remember…”
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (or equivalent) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 7850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11, SM 4.0, 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
